Command.Text: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed.

TestStep.Description: Select the ePassport application with a plain SelectApplication APDU
TestStep.TechnicalCommand: command = new ByteString("00 A4 04 0C 07 A0 00 00 02 47 10 01", HEX); response = card.gt_sendCommand(command);

ExpectedResult.TechnicalResult: assertStatusWord(new Array("9000"), card.SW.toString(HEX), FAILURE); assertMatchValue("", response, FAILURE);
